Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 9:00 AM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: E 14 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023
